about.a: Iâ€™m a Computer Science student with immense interest in Web & Software Development. I look forward to learning new technologies and enhancing my skillsets constantly over time.

I'm one of those who never coded before college and started really late.(Better late than never!) The first language I was introduced to at my college was C. Since then, I've learnt a few new languages and frameworks, and each one has added to the excitement of learning something new! I know coding can be equally fun and frustrating at times, but when it works, that gives me great inner joy! The world of programming is a never-ending ocean, and I hope to explore it a lil deeper a day.
I love watching football. The art of football mesmerizes me a lot. Other than that, I like putting colours on things which otherwise seem dull i.e. painting!
